article: I have a sister. My lifestyle is different from her. I  _  healthier than her. I exercise twice a day. Usually I come home from school  on foot  , though my home is  _  from school. It takes me more than one hour. And my eating  _  are better than hers. She often has a  stomachache  , because she likes to eat unhealthy diet.  _  I don't like milk, my mother wants me to drink it. She says it's good for my health. So I have to drink it. I try to eat  more  vegetables ten to eleven times a week. I keep eating fruit every day. They help me to keep in good health. As  _  meat, I must try to eat less of it. Of course, I love junk food too. I try to eat it only  once  a week. I sleep for nine hours every night.  _  you see, my healthy lifestyle depends on good food and exercise. It helps me study better.
